BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>Every traveler has to contend with
monster attacks now and again.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>But I hear that visiting the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>
might really help with that.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>The word is that the Great Fairy can use
her power to make <clr:0000>clothes tough as any
set of armor<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>People say there's a <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> up the
hill to the side of <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable <clr:ffff>nearby.
I wonder if she'd help me.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Why would the bandit <clr:0000>Misko <clr:ffff>hide their
precious <clr:0000>collections of clothes <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>caves<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>A piece from the collection is supposed to
be in the <clr:0000>cave at Tamio River<clr:ffff>, which flows
to the<clr:0000> northwest<clr:ffff>. That's not the mystery.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>The mystery is this—if you have wonderful
outfits, why hide them away? Why not
wear them out and about all the time?<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Did they not fit anymore?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>This is more myth than gossip, I suppose.<sp:5:1:0>
But have you heard of <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> the bandit
and their <clr:0000>legendary clothing<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Their collection of clothes is supposed to
be hidden in caves all over the world.<sp:0:4:0>One of those, if the tales are true, is in
the <clr:0000>cave at Tamio River<clr:ffff>, which flows
northwest of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Isn't that a charming story? I want to
believe it's true!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Have you already met the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>
near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>There's a rumor among us fashionistas
that a Great Fairy's blessing can <clr:0000>make
your clothes tougher<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Looking fabulous AND feeling fearless?
It sounds too good to be true! <sp:5:1:0>If only I
could meet her and ask...
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>There's an old legend among us
fashionistas—the story of <clr:0000>Misko <clr:ffff>the
bandit and their <clr:0000>legendary clothes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's said that they hid some in a <clr:0000>cave near
Tamio River<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>That's a little far away, but I'm tempted to
make the trip and look for it.<sp:0:4:0>I just don't want to get my clothes dirty...
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>These Cece clothes aren't waterproof, so
the rain is a constant thorn in my side.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, the bandit Misko solved this
issue by hiding their personal <clr:0000>collection
of clothes in caves<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Supposedly, the cave at <clr:0000>Tamio River to
the northwest <clr:ffff>is one such stash.<sp:0:4:0>I myself am the type to wear my finest
garments out and about every day. <sp:5:0:0>Not
sure how Misko resisted the urge.
Near_GoalPoint_01: Am I on the right track?
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Unconscious_01>I thought my days as a fashion icon were
behind me... You're brave, you know that?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't stop thinking about the <clr:0000>legendary
clothes<clr:ffff> hidden by the bandit Misko!<sp:0:4:0>I had to come when I heard that some are
hidden at the <clr:0000>cave at Tamio River<clr:ffff>, which
flows <clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>of here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>It's a little far, but I thought it might be
a manageable trip on horseback.
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Scare_00>Horrible, just horrible! I thought for sure
I was finished!
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Thanks for saving me! Here's something
for your trouble.
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, whoa!<sp:5:1:0> I'm a free spirit too, but...<sp:0:4:0>You have to put on a shirt or some
trousers before you talk to me!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Have you heard about the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>,
friend to fashionistas everywhere?<sp:0:4:0>They say a <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>blesses clothing
with enchantments <clr:ffff>that can take the sting
out of monster attacks.<sp:0:4:0>If you want to see for yourself, one of
them lives on top of that hill to the side
of <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>I blacked out... <sp:5:1:0>What happened?
Is it safe?
StartPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Right now the Great Fairy is locked up
in her flower bud and won't come out.<sp:5:0:0>
Frustrating, isn't it?<sp:0:4:0>One more thing to blame on the Upheaval.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>Have you heard the stories of <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>, the
bandit from long ago?<sp:0:4:0>One of the tales passed down has them
hiding some<clr:0000> legendary clothing<clr:ffff> in a <clr:0000>cave
at Tamio River<clr:ffff>.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Tired>*wheeze* <sp:5:0:0>*pant* <sp:5:0:0>That was horrible...
Do I still look OK?
StartPoint_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The road to the Great Fairy crumbled
in the Upheaval, so my horse can't make
it up there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>But that's OK. Having a horse is blessing
enough without needing the Great Fairy's
clothes blessings on top.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_01>I'm no traveling swordsman, but I have
monster problems like everyone else.<sp:0:4:0>If the rumors of the <clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff>'s powers
are true, I'd like her to make my Cece
outfit <clr:0000>tougher<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>One of the <clr:0000>Great Fairies<clr:ffff> is supposed to
live up the hill to the side of <clr:0000>Outskirt
Stable <clr:ffff>nearby... I wonder if she'd help.
SavedLv1_00: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease>Phew. I'm OK! And so are my clothes!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>I have one burning question about the
<clr:0000>blessing from the Great Fairy <clr:ffff>on top of
that hill to the side of <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>.
Can she work her magic on Cece's
clothes too?
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I don't understand why this bandit Misko
would hide their <clr:0000>clothing <clr:ffff>in a damp <clr:0000>cave
at Tamio River<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0400>If I had just one sock from that collection,
I'd flaunt it! I'd wear it every single day!
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think>I think the cave is in this direction.<sp:0:4:0>This looks to turn into an animal trail
down the road, so it might be hard to
get through there on horseback.<sp:0:4:0>I don't want anything to happen to my
horse, so I might give up on this approach
and try another way.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey there, traveler.<sp:5:1:0> Would you like to
take shelter from the rain with me?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>These Cece clothes aren't waterproof, so
the rain is a constant thorn in my side.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I love these clothes, so I want to treat
them gently. But I also want to wear them
every day. It's a conundrum.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, the bandit Misko solved this
issue by hiding their personal <clr:0000>collection
of clothes in caves<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Supposedly, the cave at <clr:0000>Tamio River to
the northwest <clr:ffff>is one such stash.<sp:0:4:0>But how did they resist the urge to wear
their finest out and about? I'm still
mulling that one over.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I get attacked by monsters on the road,
so I'd like to get a blessing from the
<clr:0000>Great Fairy<clr:ffff> near <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Tougher clothes <clr:ffff>would make my journey
easier, but there are...obstacles to that.
